ROW.NAME: 重点税源纳税情况明细表

ROW.DATDSC: select rownum rn,hynam,nsrsbh,to_char(jkfsrq,'YYYY-MM'),aa.name,sehj,zzs,xfs,sds,sdsw,bb.NAME swjg from( select max(c.NAME) hyNam,a.nsrsbh,jkfsrq,max(b.name) name,sum(zzs) zzs,sum(xfs) xfs,sum(sds) sds,sum(sdsw) sdsw,sum(sehj) sehj,substr(max(b.swjg_dm),0,7) swjg from tax_kpdata a,tax_company b,v_tax_hyclass c where a.NSRSBH=b.id(+) [%SWJGSTR] and b.typclsid=c.id(+) and jkfsrq >= to_date('[%YYMM1]','YYYY-MM') and jkfsrq <= to_date('[%YYMM2]','YYYY-MM') group by a.nsrsbh,jkfsrq order by jkfsrq desc ) aa,v_swjg bb --where sehj>=500000 and aa.swjg=bb.ID(+) where aa.nsrsbh='[%CMID]' and aa.swjg=bb.ID(+)
